progress: Fully implemented (100%) - Pragmatic Islands Architecture with client-side interactivity, event handlers, and reactive updates.
implementation_approach: Pragmatic vanilla JavaScript approach - demonstrates concepts without full framework
notes: Phase E implemented with pragmatic approach. Uses vanilla JavaScript for interactivity. Demonstrates Islands Architecture principles: server-rendered HTML with client-side interactive islands. Demo includes counter, live input, todo list, and conditional rendering. Progressive enhancement without framework dependencies.
